text: Papua New Guinea competed as the host nation at the 2015 Pacific Games in Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea from 4 to 18 July 2015. Team PNG listed 625 competitors across all 28 disciplines as of 4 July 2015. ==Athletics== left Papua New Guinea qualified 69 athletes in track and field (including parasport events) for the 2015
